news.content:
Community Update

It’s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month Jack-o-lantern An upgrade to testnet, progress on TF Now, some notable new team members, & more! & we have a community call this Monday.

Full details here: http://bit.ly/tfoct2020update
news.excerpt: It’s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month.

next.title: ThreeFold at Barcelona Blockchain Week
next.excerpt: On 6th October at 1pm CEST our very own rocket scientist Weynand Kuijpers will be representing ThreeFold.
